    • Method Detail

      • buildFileTree

        java.util.concurrent.Future<javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode> buildFileTree(java.lang.String rootPath,
                                                                                   Filter filter,
                                                                                   java.lang.Boolean hash,
                                                                                   java.lang.Boolean recordInCache,
                                                                                   int maxDepth)
        Builder of the File Tree
        Parameters:
        rootPath - String representation of the root path
        filter - Filter used to check files
        hash - Boolean, equals true for hashing files on tree building, false either
        recordInCache - Boolean, equals true for saving tree files on cache.
        Returns:
        The DefaultMutableTreeNode root of the Tree in a thread result object.

      • buildFileTree

        java.util.concurrent.Future<javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode> buildFileTree(java.lang.String rootPath,
                                                                                   java.lang.Boolean hash,
                                                                                   java.lang.Boolean recordInCache,
                                                                                   int maxDepth)
        Default tree builder
        Parameters:
        rootPath - String representation of the root path
        hash - Boolean, equals true for hashing files on tree building, false either
        recordInCache - Boolean, equals true for saving tree files on cache.
        Returns:
        The DefaultMutableTreeNode root of the Tree in a thread result object.

      • getDuplicates

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.io.File>> getDuplicates(java.lang.String path,
                                                                           Filter filter)
        Method returning duplicates files in a path
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter used to check files
        path - String representation of the path on which you want to ckeck duplicates
        Returns:
        Return list of duplicates indexed by hash in a map.

      • getChildByPath

        javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getChildByPath(java.lang.String path)
        Method getting a node from his path on the tree Exemple: if root path is: "/home/", path could be "/session/.../". Path "/session/" is not valid, use getRoot()
        Parameters:
        path - The string representation of the node path searched
        Returns:
        The node in tree corresponding to the path.

      • getRoot

        javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getRoot()
        Method allowing to get the tree root
        Returns:
        A DefaultMutableTreeNode corresponding to the tree root
